scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.db:health: tsx -e "import('./server/health').then(h => h.readinessCheck({}, { status: (c) => ({ json: (d) => console.log('DB Health:', d) }) }))"

scripts.deploy:build: npm run deploy:check && npm run build
